model to classify the activity of new unseen subjects from their sensor data.
21.3 Beneﬁts of Neural Network Modeling
Traditionally, methods from the ﬁeld of signal processing were used to analyze and distill the
collected sensor data. Such methods were for feature engineering, creating domain-speciﬁc,
sensor-speciﬁc, or signal processing-speciﬁc features and views of the original data. Statistical
